generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane asphalt road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- building: A multi-story residential building with balconies and windows is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along the right side of the road and in the background.
- sky: A bright, overcast sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging above the road, showing red.

- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, adjacent to the parked cars.
